verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Who is there Jesus
That reigns above you?
Who has the power and
Wisdom you do?

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
You rule forever
You’re seated on high
I fall before you
My spirit cries there is

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
No throne
Higher than your throne
No kingdom
Greater than yours
There is no throne
Higher than your throne
You are Lord

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
You gaze with love upon
All hearts of faith
You show such mercy
Compassion and grace

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
Yet there’s perfect justice at
Your judgement seat
All kings and nations are
Under your feet there is

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Lord of all Lords King of all Kings
Now and forever the universe sings
Lord of all Lords King of all Kings
With all creation your children sing
